description: Dolibarr ERP CRM is a modern software package to manage your company or foundation's activity (contacts, suppliers, invoices, orders, stocks, agenda, accounting, ...). It is open source software (written in PHP) and designed for small and medium businesses, foundations and freelancers. You can freely install, use and distribute it as a standalon…
